directions: Mix milk and pudding mix in a bowl; stir cream cheese into pudding mixture. Fold whipped topping into pudding mixture. Mix marshmallows, pecans, and pineapple into pudding mixture. Refrigerate until flavors combine, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
title: Pistachio and Pecan Salad
